text: "Melissa" (sometimes called "Sweet Melissa") is a 1972 song by The Allman Brothers Band and is the second single from their fourth studio album Eat a Peach. It was written by Gregg Allman in 1967. It did not chart on any of the Billboard charts. == References == Category:1972 songs Category:Allman Brothers Band songs Category:Country rock songs Category:Southern rock songs
title: Melissa (song)
